## Tools & Workflow

Map creation was performed in ArcGIS Pro 3.1 using data sourced from the U.S. Fish and Wildlife Service, U.S. Postal Service, and the Esri Living Atlas. This map recently received 2nd Place in the Professional category of the [2023 GIS Certification Institute Map Contest](https://www.gisci.org/About-Us/Map-Contest/Previous-Contest-Winners).
